Description: Welcome to Paradise6.5 acres of relaxation featuring four refreshing swimming pools, three whirlpools, cascading waterfalls and top-notch amenities. Grab a tube and float down our famous lazy river, stretch out on a comfy daybed or find your bliss with a poolside massage.For those looking to dial it up a notch, our spacious cabanas have room for eight and include flat screen televisions, personalized bottle and food service, and amazing views that overlook the pools.
Location: 3770 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
